name: restifiedts
description: RestifiedTS is a powerful, lightweight, and fully extensible API automation framework built in TypeScript, designed as a battle-ready alternative to Java's RestAssured â€” but with modern capabilities tailored for JavaScript/Node.js ecosystems.

scripts.test: npm run test:clean && npm run test:all:json && npm run test:merge:all
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:clean && npm run test:unit:json && npm run test:merge:unit
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:clean && npm run test:integration:json && npm run test:merge:integration
scripts.test:smoke: npm run test:clean && npm run test:smoke:json && npm run test:merge:smoke
scripts.test:regression: npm run test:clean && npm run test:regression:json && npm run test:merge:regression
scripts.test:systems: npm run test:clean && npm run test:logging:json && npm run test:storage:json && npm run test:database:json && npm run test:merge:systems
scripts.test:clean: rimraf output && mkdirp output/reports && mkdirp output/snapshots && mkdirp output/temp && mkdirp output/logs
scripts.test:all:json: mocha --project tsconfig.test.json -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register -r tests/helpers/cleanup-helper.ts "tests/unit/**/*.test.ts" "tests/integration/**/*.test.ts" --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=output/reports,reportFilename=mochawesome-all,json=true
scripts.test:unit:json: mocha --project tsconfig.test.json -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register -r tests/helpers/cleanup-helper.ts "tests/unit/**/*.test.ts" --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=output/reports,reportFilename=mochawesome-unit,json=true
scripts.test:integration:json: mocha --project tsconfig.test.json -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register -r tests/helpers/cleanup-helper.ts "tests/integration/**/*.test.ts" --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=output/reports,reportFilename=mochawesome-integration,json=true
scripts.test:smoke:json: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.test.json mocha -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register --grep '@smoke' 'tests/**/*.test.ts' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=output/reports,reportFilename=mochawesome-smoke,json=true
scripts.test:regression:json: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.test.json mocha -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register --grep '@regression' 'tests/**/*.test.ts' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=output/reports,reportFilename=mochawesome-regression,json=true
scripts.test:logging:json: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.test.json mocha -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register 'tests/unit/logging/*.test.ts' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=output/reports,reportFilename=mochawesome-logging,json=true
scripts.test:storage:json: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.test.json mocha -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register 'tests/unit/storage/*.test.ts' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=output/reports,reportFilename=mochawesome-storage,json=true
scripts.test:database:json: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.test.json mocha -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register 'tests/integration/database/*.test.ts' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=output/reports,reportFilename=mochawesome-database,json=true
scripts.test:merge:all: mochawesome-merge output/reports/mochawesome-all.json -o output/reports/all-consolidated.json && marge output/reports/all-consolidated.json --reportDir output/reports --reportFilename all-test-report --inline
scripts.test:merge:unit: mochawesome-merge output/reports/mochawesome-unit.json -o output/reports/unit-consolidated.json && marge output/reports/unit-consolidated.json --reportDir output/reports --reportFilename unit-test-report --inline
scripts.test:merge:smoke: mochawesome-merge output/reports/mochawesome-smoke.json -o output/reports/smoke-consolidated.json && marge output/reports/smoke-consolidated.json --reportDir output/reports --reportFilename smoke-test-report --inline
scripts.test:merge:systems: mochawesome-merge output/reports/mochawesome-logging.json output/reports/mochawesome-storage.json output/reports/mochawesome-database.json -o output/reports/systems-consolidated.json && marge output/reports/systems-consolidated.json --reportDir output/reports --reportFilename systems-test-report --inline
scripts.test:comprehensive: npm run test:systems && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:smoke && npm run test:regression && npm run test:merge:comprehensive
scripts.test:merge:comprehensive: mochawesome-merge output/reports/systems-consolidated.json output/reports/unit-consolidated.json output/reports/integration-consolidated.json output/reports/smoke-consolidated.json output/reports/regression-consolidated.json -o output/reports/comprehensive-consolidated.json && marge output/reports/comprehensive-consolidated.json --reportDir output/reports --reportFilename comprehensive-test-report --inline
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test:report: npm run test:smoke:json && npm run test:restified:json && npm run report:merge
scripts.test:restified:json: mocha --project tsconfig.test.json -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register tests/unit/RestifiedTS.test.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=output/reports,reportFilename=mochawesome-restified,json=true
scripts.report:merge: mochawesome-merge output/reports/mochawesome-*.json > output/reports/mochawesome-merged.json && mochawesome-report-generator output/reports/mochawesome-merged.json --reportDir output/reports --reportFilename RestifiedTS-Consolidated-Report --inline
